title: Tour Daily Podcast, stage 15: Emotions all around
content:
Tour Daily Podcast, stage 15: Emotions all around

A mountainous stage in the Pyrenees ended with a wonderful victory, while elsewhere in Italy tears fell after the final stage of the Giro Donne.
